about_the_game:
The Moonflower is a cooperative horror-survival videogame, containing the Story Mode (Still under development) and the Multiplayer Mode, the game is set in an abandoned island, where there is the well-known demon "Moonflower", named after its appearance similar to that of a flower, many rumors say he resurrected after a long time in a sunflower field. Since the Moonflower can no longer be contained, the players have been instructed to "block" it as much as possible or hunt it through an underground laboratory, each player has his own personal laboratory, you can decide whether to create your own laboratory, or search for a laboratory to help another player. To advance the underground lab you'll need to scavenge for resources outside the haunted forest, but don't stay too far out! Otherwise your panic level will rise and as a result the moonflower will smell your fear and turn you into meatballs, also watch out for the ghosts of the moonflower, they roam the forest thirsty for blood. As you play, you will earn "Mooney" (the in-game currency to unlock new rewards) through the time you play and the progress you make.
Cooperate, find, risk, explore, locate, communicate, plan and recontain the Moonflower to accomplish the mission!
